content.raw:
We have to keep the function because it's used in subclasses (ODEPlanShape). We used to put warning messages in functions like theses, but they don't serve a great purpose and cause a lot of spam. For example, if a physics engine doesn't require a function, then we'd get these warning messages even though everything is okay.

A warning message could be put in the child-most class, if it's needed.
